data.text: @markgooding @ukinthailand Great initiative you’ll be happy to here I just returned from the UK. However maybe you can raise up to him the Test and Go process which works well until it’s handed over to the private sector hotel/hospital combo who are just trying to fleece innocent travellers with any excuse
@markgooding @ukinthailand Hi Mark...is there any update on the Pfizer booster situation? A good majority of UK Expats are now reaching their sixth month requirement? #expatvac
